title: Profane servitor

==Useful Info==
Profane servitors are angels of [[the Shining One]] who have been corrupted by [[Yredelemnul]]. Profane servitors are resistant to most damage types, including pure [[holy]] damage, and have vampiric/draining attacks. Their [[umbra]] lowers your [[to-hit]] slightly. Profane servitors are rare, occasionally encountered while wandering [[the Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], and certain [[Crypt]]:3 layouts.

==Tips & Tricks==
*[[Demon]]s, [[undead]], and worshippers of [[Dithmenos]] or [[Yredelemnul]] are immune to the umbra's penalties. This includes monsters that worship Yredelemnul. Any [[halo]] effects will cancel out the umbra.
*Although profane servitors are resistant to holy attacks (e.g. Cleansing Flame), they are still vulnerable to weapons of [[holy wrath]].
*Keep in mind that they aren't resistant to fire and acid damage.

==History==
Profane servitors were added in [[0.10]].
